page.title: 06Unemployment in Ayr.
page.content: May 1985 6735 people registered as {unemployed}in Ayr. 14% of the total requiring employment. The local Job Centre has 336 jobs on offer. Employment in Ayr fluctuates marked_ ly in summer.{ Hotels, restaurants and {leisure facilities}provide jobs from April to October. Types of jobs available have changed over the past decade. Previous large employers in{engineering}have declined dramatically. New high technology {computer firms}require highly skilled employees. The commercial sector has remained stable. The outlook is gloomy with no major employers being attracted. Vain hope is for a large employer requiring a high ratio of unskilled labour. The reality is small businesses offering employment to a few semi_skilled applicants.
